about_the_game:
Collectibles! — a true paradise for collectors! Collect unique items, share them with friends, and show off your achievements on the leaderboards!

HURRY TO COMPLETE YOUR COLLECTIONS


NEW COLLECTIONS EVERY 30 DAYS! Old collections will be archived and no longer available. Hurry up to collect them all — you won’t get a second chance!

GET UNIQUE STICKERS!


A NEW STICKER PACK WILL BE AVAILABLE EVERY 2 HOURS, from which you can get stickers of various rarities.

Here is what you can do with your stickers:

  • Keep them in your album for everyone to see and envy
  • Destroy them to earn additional ranking points
  • Combine 5 stickers to get a rare and valuable item
  • Sell stickers on the marketplace!

ARCHIVED COLLECTIONS


ARCHIVED COLLECTIONS GIVE +10% TO YOUR RANKING FOR EVERY NEW COLLECTION! Want to be at the top? Start collecting with us right now!

FEEDBACK


WE ARE ALWAYS OPEN TO YOUR SUGGESTIONS FOR IMPROVING THE GAME AND IDEAS FOR NEW COLLECTIONS. JOIN OUR COMMUNITY ON !
detailed_description:
Current Season

Introducing the Cube Season! This season is all about embracing the cube and reshaping your gameplay experience with geometric precision! Dive into a fresh challenge with new cube-themed collectibles!

Hurry and complete your Cube album before it ends on November 12!


About the Game

Collectibles! — a true paradise for collectors! Collect unique items, share them with friends, and show off your achievements on the leaderboards!

HURRY TO COMPLETE YOUR COLLECTIONS


NEW COLLECTIONS EVERY 30 DAYS! Old collections will be archived and no longer available. Hurry up to collect them all — you won’t get a second chance!

GET UNIQUE STICKERS!


A NEW STICKER PACK WILL BE AVAILABLE EVERY 2 HOURS, from which you can get stickers of various rarities.

Here is what you can do with your stickers:

  • Keep them in your album for everyone to see and envy
  • Destroy them to earn additional ranking points
  • Combine 5 stickers to get a rare and valuable item
  • Sell stickers on the marketplace!

ARCHIVED COLLECTIONS


ARCHIVED COLLECTIONS GIVE +10% TO YOUR RANKING FOR EVERY NEW COLLECTION! Want to be at the top? Start collecting with us right now!

FEEDBACK


WE ARE ALWAYS OPEN TO YOUR SUGGESTIONS FOR IMPROVING THE GAME AND IDEAS FOR NEW COLLECTIONS. JOIN OUR COMMUNITY ON !

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or PopOS, Ubuntu 22.04+
  • Processor: Any, with at least 1.0 GHz clock speed
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS or PopOS, Ubuntu 22.04+
  • Processor: Any, with more than 1.0 GHz clock speed
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Collectibles!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any, with at least 1.0 GHz clock speed
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
